page.title: 06Village Supernatural
page.content:
A lady says along time ago some men were putting up pylons in a field. One man fell from the top of the pylon and was killed. The lady's husband thought he saw the same man walking across the field.
Once a month the lady from Hill Farm goes down stairs to find the down stairs lights on when she knows the night before she turned them off.
At White Elm Farm a man committed suicide, so, as they always did in those days they drove a stake through his heart. They buried him and later a white elm tree grew on the same spot.They say he still comes up from under the tree and haunts the area.
